name: iamczech/easyadmin-fields-bundle
description: Extends basic EasyAdmin fields and works well with AssetMapper and Smyfony 7.4^

suggest.npm-asset/sortablejs: Provides drag 'n drop functionality. Install via `symfony console importmap:require sortablejs`.
suggest.@symfony/stimulus-bridge: Required for Stimulus controllers to work. Install via `symfony console importmap:require @symfony/stimulus-bridge`.
